title: Anyone playing Archeage?
body:
I'm getting to a point in which I enjoy watching Tournaments more than playing.

That's why I trolled so much in League and that's why I can't play more than 1 or 2 games of Hearthstone without contemplating offing myself.


Archeage is a game I can chill on without care though, I just need people to play it with. 

Anyone playing it?
